name: THE HORRORS OF ENDLESS NIGHT.
description: I forget where I originally saw this quote, "They talk of brimstone and fire and pain, and the horrors of endless night; They talk of a place that should never at all be mentioned in ears polite.". There was something strangely bizarre about it that made read it a few times and then it hit me. It was the phrase 'the horrors of endless night..." that what really caught my attention. I got the chills when I thought of that actual scenario off darkness with no sunlight at all. I'm walking with my flashlight in total darkness and all I see is this gradient all around me; an endless purple mist made for the meandering. I see the words, 'the horrors of endless night' appear and then fade into the medium like shimmering glitter falling gently to the ground from a pixie's wand. Then endless night.
